file_content.text: --some trouble here! They shot out the airlock, but the clamps are jammed up--we can't do anything!
--is Iresso. The airlock is blown and the docking clamps are fused. Need assistance ASAP!
--can't detach. Repeat, airlock is blown out and docking clamps aren't responding. We can't come in, and can't detach. Do you copy?
--keep trying! Captain, we're locked down--docking clamps are shot and the airlock is blown. Can you give us a hand?
--thing isn't working right. Are you there? Droids put a bunch of holes in the airlock and melted the docking clamps--we could use some help!
--ever get my hands on... there! We're in some trouble here, Sith--droids shot through the airlock, and the docking clamps won't let us loose.
--still trying! Are you there? We need a hand--droids blew out the airlock and fused the docking clamps--we can't come in or take off.
--mess you've gotten us into! Blasted droids shot out the airlock and fused the docking clamps. Can't come in, can't take off. Get over here!
I'll be there right away, Kira. Just hang in there.
I copy, Jorgan--I'm on my way!
I'm en route, Kaliyo--just hold on!
